title: View Local Branches
description: In this lab, you will learn how to view a list of all local branches in a Git repository, which is a fundamental Git operation for managing and visualizing the development workflow.

meta.title: Mastering Git: Explore Local Branches with Ease
meta.description: Discover the power of Git's local branches and learn how to view them effortlessly.
meta.keywords: software development, version control, repository, git labs, git, local branches, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看本地分支
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何查看Git仓库中所有本地分支的列表，这是管理和可视化开发工作流程的一项基本Git操作。

meta.title: 精通Git：轻松探索本地分支
meta.description: 发现Git本地分支的强大功能，并学习如何轻松查看它们。
meta.keywords: 软件开发, 版本控制, 仓库, Git实验室, Git, 本地分支, Git游乐场

verify.name: 验证是否成功查看
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
